column1: Subject: Marital Status, Marriages and Divorces
Male General Divorce Rate * (Per 1,000 Married Resident Aged 20 Years & Over)
50 Years And Over (Per 1,000 Married Resident Males)
Female General Divorce Rate * (Per 1,000 Married Resident Aged 20 Years & Over)
50 Years And Over (Per 1,000 Married Resident Females)

MALE GENERAL MARRIAGE RATE - PRIOR TO 1984, DATA ARE BASED ON TOTAL GROOMS AND TOTAL POPULATION.  FROM 1984 ONWARDS, DATA ARE BASED ON RESIDENT GROOMS AND RESIDENT POPULATION (I.E. SINGAPORE CITIZENS AND PERMANENT RESIDENTS).
60 - 64 YEARS - FOR 1980-1983, DATA REFER TO AGE GROUP 60 YEARS & OVER.

FEMALE GENERAL MARRIAGE RATE - PRIOR TO 1984, DATA ARE BASED ON TOTAL BRIDES AND TOTAL POPULATION.  FROM 1984 ONWARDS, DATA ARE BASED ON RESIDENT BRIDES AND RESIDENT POPULATION (I.E. SINGAPORE CITIZENS AND PERMANENT RESIDENTS).
60 - 64 YEARS - FOR 1980-1983, DATA REFER TO AGE GROUP 60 YEARS & OVER.

CRUDE MARRIAGE RATE - PRIOR TO 1984, DATA ARE BASED ON TOTAL MARRIAGES.  FROM 1984 ONWARDS, DATA ARE BASED ON RESIDENT MARRIAGES WHERE EITHER OR BOTH THE GROOM AND BRIDE ARE RESIDENTS (I.E. SINGAPORE CITIZENS AND PERMANENT RESIDENTS).
